# 25.K 个一组翻转链表

# 题目

原题链接

# 思路

# 代码

/**
 * Definition for singly-linked list.
 * public class ListNode {
 *     int val;
 *     ListNode next;
 *     ListNode(int x) { val = x; }
 * }
 */
class Solution {
    public ListNode reverseKGroup(ListNode head, int k) {
        ListNode curr = head;
        int count = 0;
        while (curr != null && count != k) {
            curr = curr.next;
            count++;
        }
        if (count == k) {
            curr = reverseKGroup(curr, k);
            while (count-- > 0) {
                ListNode tmp = head.next;
                head.next = curr;
                curr = head;
                head = tmp;
            }
            head = curr;
        }
        return head;
    }
}
